data.eml:eml: Integrative diagnosis, biological observations, and histopathology of the fig cyst nematode Heteroderafici Kirjanova (1954) associated with Ficuscarica L. in southern Italy

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fanelli, Elena, Vovlas, Alessio, Santoro, Simona, Troccoli, Alberto, Giuseppe Lucarelli,, Trisciuzzi, Nicola, Luca, Francesca De (2019): Integrative diagnosis, biological observations, and histopathology of the fig cyst nematode Heteroderafici Kirjanova (1954) associated with Ficuscarica L. in southern Italy. ZooKeys 824: 1-19, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.824.26820, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.824.26820
